attributes.action: Stop the unnecessary euthanasia of dog breeds based the way they look not act
attributes.additional_details: It is murdering innocent well-behaved animals and preventing them from living a happy violent free life just like other dogs. Many dogs have been unfairly killed or had to wear muzzles in public leading them to become more nervous and uncontrollable when before the muzzle they were perfectly behaved dogs
attributes.background: End breed specific legislation so that healthy and happy, obedient dogs aren’t euthanised just because they fit the appearance of a dangerous dog even if they have not acted dangerously
